description: A website built using Google Firebase and React. This website is to showcase the photographs I've captured over the years. The project's auth, database and datastore is handled by Firebase

An automated screen capturing tool built using HTML, CSS, JS and Python to make our lives easier. It provides users with functionality to capture screenshots they require and add it neatly into a word file and save it.
